item.title: Links
item.author: blackvolga@pm.me (GAZ23)
item.description: Basics Notepad https://privatebin.net/ Shared Notepad http://etherpad.org/ Identity https://keybase.io/ Email https://protonmail.com/ Chat https://crypto.cat/ Mobile https://signal.org/ Disk\File Encryption https://www.veracrypt.fr/en/Home.html https://letsencrypt.org/ https://haveibeenpwned.com/ http://www.shodan.io/ WebGun - WebGun, XSS Payload Creator Hackvertor - Tool to convert various encodings and generate attack vectors Fuzzdb - Dictionary of attack patterns and primitives for black-box application testing Polyglot Challenge with submitted solutions SecList - A collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments.
